an4.243:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an4.243:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4.243:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an4.243:4.6: “Kuto taṃ, bhante, adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamissati.
an4.243:4.7: Āyasmato, bhante, anuruddhassa bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṃ saṃghabhedāya ṭhito.
an4.243:4.8: Tatrāyasmā anuruddho na ekavācikampi bhaṇitabbaṃ maññatī”ti.
an4.243:5.1: “Kadā panānanda, anuruddho saṃghamajjhe adhikaraṇesu voyuñjati.
an4.243:5.2: Nanu, ānanda, yāni kānici adhikaraṇāni uppajjanti, sabbāni tāni tumhe ceva vūpasametha sāriputtamoggallānā ca.
an4.243:6.1: Cattārome, ānanda, atthavase sampassamāno pāpabhikkhu saṅghabhedena nandati.
an4.243:6.3: Idhānanda, pāpabhikkhu dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo asuci saṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti avassuto kasambujāto.
an4.243:6.6: dussīlo pāpadhammo asuci saṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti avassuto kasambujātoti, samaggā maṃ santā nāsessanti;
an4.243:6.8: Idaṃ, ānanda, paṭhamaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno pāpabhikkhu saṅghabhedena nandati.
an4.243:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, ānanda, pāpabhikkhu micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato.
an4.243:7.4: micchādiṭṭhiko antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgatoti, samaggā maṃ santā nāsessanti;
an4.243:7.6: Idaṃ, ānanda, dutiyaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno pāpabhikkhu saṅghabhedena nandati.
an4.243:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, ānanda, pāpabhikkhu micchāājīvo hoti, micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti.
an4.243:8.4: micchāājīvo micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappetīti, samaggā maṃ santā nāsessanti;
an4.243:8.6: Idaṃ, ānanda, tatiyaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno pāpabhikkhu saṃghabhedena nandati.
an4.243:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, ānanda, pāpabhikkhu lābhakāmo hoti sakkārakāmo anavaññattikāmo.
an4.243:9.4: lābhakāmo sakkārakāmo anavaññattikāmoti, samaggā maṃ santā na sakkarissanti na garuṃ karissanti na mānessanti na pūjessanti;
an4.243:9.5: vaggā pana maṃ sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessantī’ti.
an4.243:9.6: Idaṃ, ānanda, catutthaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno pāpabhikkhu saṅghabhedena nandati.
an4.243:9.7: Ime kho, ānanda, cattāro atthavase sampassamāno pāpabhikkhu saṅghabhedena nandatī”ti.
